thread.title: Irina Shayk is ‘low maintenance’ in relationships
thread.title_full: Irina Shayk is ‘low maintenance’ in relationships - Bangalore Mirror

author: bangaloremirror.com
title: Irina Shayk is ‘low maintenance’ in relationships
text:
Supermodel Irina Shayk, who is dating actor Bradley Cooper, says she is "low maintenance" when it comes to relationships. "A cute card is always nice. I may be Russian, but I'm low maintenance," femalefirst.co.uk Quote: d Shayk as saying.
Her boyfriend Cooper has been sober after he made a conscious decision in 2004 to ditch drugs and alcohol.
The Russian model, who started dating the Limitless actor earlier this year, noted that her mother advised her to "never date a guy who smokes or drinks."
"Actually, I remember my mom told me never to date a guy who smokes or drinks. My father played hockey and boxed, and my mom loved the fact he was really healthy," she added.
